body:
ABOUT US
Adventure guru is a very young & vibrant media house headed by  Prestigious professionals of Mumbai, Chennai and New Delhi and managed by highly experienced and capable Research and production team. We are passionate about combining new strategy with art,,technology and creative solutions. We have all Post Production Equipments and editing facilities. Our integrated services cover all aspects of creative media. We deals in  Corporate films | Content creation | social media | election Campaigns | Web Movies | documentaries | ad films | event production | video brochure | public relation.
